segments.text: Have you been taken of , miss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am Looking for a T-shirt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have quite a variety of shirts here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of material is this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Silk . You have a good taste . It's excellent for its handiness , elegance and beauty .
segments.speaker: S1
